newsitem.title: JAPAN: BOJ governor's next scheduled briefing on Sept 18.
newsitem.headline: BOJ governor's next scheduled briefing on Sept 18.

text.p: The Bank of Japan (BOJ) said on Friday that the next scheduled news conference of its governor, Yasuo Matsushita, will be at 3 p.m. (0600 GMT) on September 18.
Financial market operators are awaiting comments by Matsushita on BOJ monetary policy after the release on Wednesday of the central bank's key short-term corporate survey, or "tankan", for August.
The tankan showed the business outlook among major manufacturers had worsened since the previous survey in May.
Matsushita has said Japan's economy has been recovering gradually and that the BOJ's policy is aimed at ensuring a basis for recovery.
The central back has kept its official discount rate at a record low 0.5 percent since September last year.
